name: Her voice
description:
Hi, I'm a custom lamp so don't expect an usual lamp name like sjöbekorp or ârstrupp. Actually, I'm the only lamp around here so I don't really need a name anyway.

Enough about me, I'm not much for spotlights. I'm here to present a game I made. It's simple, really, and rather short. It's the story of my owner who had troubles dealing with a break-up (even though he's the one who responsible for it).

I'll highlight that it is my first game so adversity is to be expected. By the way, I'll be thankful to anyone who'll put any bug into light.

Thank you for stopping by. I hope you like the game. You can download it for free. If you feel like it, there's also a possibility to support me as I plan to mass produce toy figures of myself.
